footer.ebay-dev-alt: Auction Template takes part in eBays developers program.
footer.short-desc: Auction Template offers you eBay product description templates exclusively developed with HTML and CSS for your eBay listings. We have taken into account all the important eBay guidelines {{year}} (Responsive, HTTPS/SSL, no active content with JavaScript, etc.) so that you get a holistic and satisfying solution with the Auction Template open source project. Our eBay ad templates are professionally developed and focused on a consistent and reputable appearance for your eBay store. Unlike other providers, Auction Template participates in eBays developers program and thus has access to official and secured data sources from eBay. Through these APIs we receive the information and images of your items that you would otherwise have had to enter in tedious double maintenance. The automatically generated auction template from Auction Template can be easily edited with our innovative editor and the generated HTML code can be directly inserted into the product descriptions of your eBay listings.
footer.disclaimer: Auction Template is not owned or operated by eBay Inc. eBay and the eBay logo are registered trademarks of eBay Inc.

cookies.title: We use cookies.
cookies.body: In order to optimize our website for you and to improve it continuously, we use cookies. By continuing to use the website, you are consenting to the use of cookies. You can find more information about cookies in our

dev-alert: Auction Template is currently under development and will be fully operational from april 1, 2021. As of now, some of the content is incomplete or only partially translated.
